rooms.name: Living and Kitchen Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with an integrated kitchen, designed in Mediterranean style featuring stone finishes, warm wood tones, and terracotta accents. The space is oriented to capture morning sunlight as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: Multi-functional studio apartment with an open design that can be sectioned for sleeping, working, and leisure areas. Mediterranean elements such as arched doorways and wrought iron details are incorporated, ensuring compliance with local building norms.

rooms.name: Utility Area
rooms.description: Includes laundry and storage spaces. Designed to maintain balance and energy flow according to Vastu guidelines by placing the utility area in a less prominent position.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to align with positive energy flow as per Vastu principles. The door features Mediterranean style detailing.
Large window installation for ample natural light and cross ventilation, adhering to local building norms and enhancing the open-plan layout.
Provides outdoor space with Mediterranean design elements such as decorative railings. Balconies are positioned to capture the calming view of nature in compliance with local building standards.

rooms.name: Master Suite
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed with Mediterranean style, featuring traditional arches and warm color palettes. The orientation of the room follows Vastu principles to enhance restful energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom that balances functionality and design. Adheres to local building norms while incorporating Mediterranean detailing such as patterned tiles and decorative moldings.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Fully functional bathroom with fixtures compliant with local codes. Vastu principles guide the positioning of the water element within a well-balanced layout.

openings.location: Corner between Studio Apartment and Utility Area
openings.description: Well-designed staircase ensuring safe vertical circulation while adhering to local building standards.
Strategically placed for privacy and natural light. Vastu principles are considered to align with positive energy flow in bedrooms.
